::: {.column-page-inset}
<div class="content-narrow">

We welcome comments, suggestions, and revisions to improve the protocol, and encourage more members of the herbarium community to join the **IHerbSpec Working Group**.  

To get in touch, please use the form below. Your message will be delivered securely to the working group coordinators.  

If you prefer, you can also reach out via the contact details on our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/IHerbSpec/iherbspec.github.io).

</div>
:::

<div class="contact-form">

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/mqadrbwo" method="POST">
  <label>
    Your Name:
    <input type="text" name="name" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Your Email:
    <input type="email" name="_replyto" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Message:
    <textarea name="message" rows="6" required></textarea>
  </label>

  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>

</div>
